headline.main: $18,000 IN VITAMINS DONATED TO BRITISH; Jewish Organization Presents Concentrate to Red Cross to Be Used for Children NATION'S COURAGE HAILED Rabbi Stephen Wise Makes the Gift to Sustain Health of Young War Victims

lead_paragraph: On behalf of the Esco Fund, of which Mrs. Frank Cohen is president, and Karen Ami, a Jewish charitable organization, Dr. Stephen S. Wise, president of the American Jewish Congress, presented an $18,000 gift of vitamins to the American Red Cross during ceremonies in the headquarters of the New York Chapter, 315 Lexington Avenue.
abstract: Food and med aid: Esco Fund and Karen Ami donate vitamins to Amer Red Cross N Y Chap
